title: Water-Polo Skills
brief_description: In the context of a game of water polo between two school boy teams, we see the fundamental skills to be mastered, including those of a goalkeeper. The skills are the water polo kick, swimming with the ball, and ways to pick the ball up, catching and passing, the roll, the tackle and pass, and five different shots for goal.
